entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , McCreary
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:17 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
